docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Derek Raghavan joins the Consults blog to answer readers' questions about melanoma.Last week, the Food and Drug Administration approved Yervoy, or ipilimumab, a new treatment for use in patients with advanced malignant melanoma. The decision is a landmark in view of the relative lack of effective, available treatments for this skin cancer once it has spread through the body.

headline.main: A New Era in Melanoma Treatment

docs.abstract: Dr. Derek Raghavan responds to reader questions about a new treatment that improved survival in those with advanced melanoma.
docs.snippet: Dr. Derek Raghavan responds to reader questions about a new treatment that improved survival in those with advanced melanoma.
